From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Veratis shook the frail humanoid in his hand. "Pathetic creatures. It would
seem that this planets futures based on inferior beings." A drone floated
near and scanned Saurus. "I guess they have a use after all." Veratis said
as he observed the findings. "It seems that these beings are plasma based
internally." he licked his lips hungery for the taste of the real thing
instead of the synthetic mixture he pumped into his chamber each night. "It
may only be a morsel but it's still plasma." The half bat creature opened
his mouth and bit down on the protohumans neck draining him of every last
drop. Veratis looked at the pendant that had caused Nightmenace such pain.
"This on the other hand might prove usefull" the old bot pulled the silver
item from around the neck of Saurus and dropped the lifeless body to the
ground.

(Depending which superstition you follow about the werewolf, Lycanthrops can
be hurt or killed by other members of the undead. Nobody knows what it would
take to kill Veratis, nobody's tried.)
